channel.title: The Sources answered the questions "best practices" couldn't.
channel.description:
Henri Nyakarundi is the founder of ARED, a solar kiosk platform used for product distribution network in rural and urban areas in East Africa.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://peerlearning.is/knowledge-in-context/
